paragraphs: I started building static websites in high school, and since then I’ve developed expertise in software development, and business analysis. Today I’m passionate about scalable applications powered by the cloud. I have a good combination of skills and experience that allows me to implement my ideas in many kinds of environments and also deliver well-constructed applications.

I've been working over these years in great companies and sometimes working on freelance jobs in order to improve my skills, I am always motivated and excited about new programing languages, approaches and coding. ...

In my time off, I enjoy playing online games with my friends, see a movie or series on Netflix with my wife, maybe on Amazon Video, and try new stuffs like to implement a website using some new technology or mobile development. I live in Quebec City, Canada and like to take advantage of the restaurants and entertainment options in the area.
Download my resume (144 KB)
Software Developer Analyst | Cofomo as external consultant at Revenu Quebec (2017-Present)
Software Developer Consultant | G&P as external consultant at Infraero Brazil (2011-2012)
